feels.name: Embarrassment
feels.quote: There was a queer smile about Mr. Brooke's mouth as he opened at poor Mary's lament.

feels.name: Shyness
feels.quote: I'm afraid you are tired; can I do anything for you?

feels.name: Friendliness
feels.quote: I'm afraid you are tired; can I do anything for you?

feels.name: Annoyance
feels.quote: Meg's lips asked that question, but her eyes added, 'And what becomes of you?'

causedByEvent.name: Feeling annoyed by Mr. Brooke's plans

feels.name: Pride
feels.quote: Meg's lips asked that question, but her eyes added, 'And what becomes of you?'

causedByEvent.name: Feeling proud of her own independence

feels.name: Satisfaction
feels.quote: Oh, yes! it was very sweet, and I'm much obliged to whoever translated it for me;

causedByEvent.name: Feeling satisfied with the German song translation

feels.name: Indolence
feels.quote: He was in one of his moods; for the day had been both unprofitable and unsatisfactory, and he was wishing he could live it over again.

feels.name: Curiosity
feels.quote: What in the world are those girls about now?

feels.name: Disappointment
feels.quote: They can't be going in the boat, for they haven't got the key. Perhaps they forgot it; I'll take it to them, and see what's going on.

causedByEvent.name: Feeling left out of the picnic
